The most Amazing Mouse Ever seen The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 ...
review:
This is FAKE, don't buy it, Also there is no refund! the Wire is thin and
looks fake! the buttons also feel cheap, worst part is the scroll wheel, it
feels very lose! Its not made to last, you will be back here looking for a new
mouse in few months!  
Very disappointed by this, I think Amazon should ban this seller

Receive the product on 22nd of September and the left click is not working
properly now today is 17th December and I am having trouble with the mouse.
Not even completed 3 months, not expected from the reputed brands like Dell. I
had already given 5 star for the mouse but now I am giving only star as I had
face the problem right now. Though it has warranty of 3 years as the seller
has described but I have to take it to the service centre and I don't know how
much time it will take to repair or replace I don't even know whether they are
going to repair or replace.

The mouse I received has a very short / thin cable and with a sub-standard USB
plug. I compared with the same product a friend of my bought from another
source. I am not sure if its a product problem or a seller duplicate!

My Dell MS11 had suddenly stopped after using it for 3 yrs , so i had surfed
the internet for budget mouse and found this one .After using it for couple of
weeks i had found it that it works perfectly and the accuracy of movement is
also good ,i had use it in editing software like Aobe Premier Pro and i worked
perfectly like a champ.I will recommend it for the user's who wants it for
daily usage and for serious gamers don't opt for this instead go for logitech
or something else as this is for daily usage and the its not that accurate in
games like other gamer mouse does it. Coming to after sales service ,it comes
with one year warranty,and dell service is very good in terms of accessories
so you blindly go for it incase you are not pro gamers.

One of the worst mouse I have encountered and I ended up returning it. Since
it didn't work properly and scroll wheel was a pain to use. Ended up going
back to Logitech, which works great.

good product by dell  
easy to use,  
great design, fully comfortable with this.  
It is available at a very good price as compare to another website. Go for it.  
This is available also in dell official website in two color black and white
at rs 350

Very small mouse but this is better(and bigger) than those tiny local laptop
mouses of cheaper brands like quantum or portronics.  
U wont find a mouse like this at this price.  
The click and wheel could have a little more weight to them, they feel very
lightweight and easy to press by accident. the clicks are not separate and are
integrated with the top body, that combined with smaller size means u will
accidently click it even with your palm/  
  
But again when u compare this with others at this price point, this is much
better than the competition. Logitech makes some mouses that are larger but
they cost around 700 rupees.

I brought it yesterday, package was good however the product is bad.Imagine
brand new product is not working.. hahaha..now thinking twice before ordering
from Amazon

The plastic material is of very inferior quality. Received it with its parts
open even when it was packed very well. Had to fix it by pressing. But was
worried if pressing both sides would damage the weak plastic parts. It works
perfectly fine.

fast delivery Amazon. Totally recommend this product.
